ApplnStageSectionDefinition.name: ApplnStageSectionDefinition
ApplnStageSectionDefinition.description: Represents a junction between an application stage definition and application section definition.

ApplicationSectionDefinitionId.description: The Application Section Definition associated with the Application Stage Section Definition.

ApplicationStageDefinitionId.description: The Application Stage Definition associated with the Application Stage Section Definition.

Name.description: The name of the Application Stage Section Definition.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Application Stage Section Definition.
